Text: *sigh*
(Why do I feel this sense of futility?)

(Over the past few days, I've tried various things to
get a grasp on the emergence of the Supreme Ruler
Rose...)

(I posed as a slightly suspicious side character near
the crime scene and infiltrated the Oriana Kingdom's
detention facility.)

(I struck up a friendship with Zack, the first to
approach me inside. He provided me with shelter
and food as I indulged in prison life.)

(Amid the facility's sinister conspiracies, I hatched
a suspenseful plot)
(and successfully orchestrated a prison break.)
(After that, I joined the volunteer army, but...)

(Despite what looked like an easy win, we had a tough
fight.)

(I tried recreating the legend passed down in the
Oriana Kingdom, lending a hand from the shadows,)
(but it seems I went a bit overboard.)

(In the end, some unknown old guys took all the
credit...)

(It just doesn't quite feel right. A fixer should
stand out while blending in at the same time...)
Hahahaha!
Hm?
I knew joining this side was the right choice!

I heard the Western Front was being pushed back.
Something about the resurrection of a legend...

Speaking of legends, there were similar rumors here
as well.

Yeah, heard they found some massive treasure in the
ruins beyond the mountains.
(Treasure?)
Forget about it. Ignorance is bliss.

These past few days, something's been off with the
higher-ups.

If we wanna save our skins, it might be time to
bolt... And hey, why not take a few ladies along
with us on our way out?
How about that gal from the innâ€”
Wha... Who the hell are you?!

I'll take what I want, even if I've gotta kill for
it.
That's the way the Lawless City works, isn't it?
I like it.
Basically, might makes right.
Which means...I am justice.
Aaaghhh!

In the silent tavern, Marie goes over her account
books.

Damn it... I can't even afford tomorrow's inventory
let alone this month's rent...
Cid...

I should've billed him for his room instead of trying
to act all cool...
Guess I'll have to sell myself again...

Marie suddenly hears a noise coming from the
tavern's entrance.
Curious, she makes her way to the entrance.

She attempts to open the door, but something is
blocking it, causing it to open only halfway.
*gasp*
What the...
Is this...money?
Just then, a gust of wind blows.
*gasp*
The next moment, the man vanishes.
Shadow...you've been watching over me...
